{ "selector": "other:value", "source_field": "other_input", "target_field": "other_output" }

{ "source_field": "date", "target_field": "date", "other_match_required": true }
{ "selector": "other:value", "source_field": "key", "target_field": "output_key", "other_match_required": true }
